free: #n kamamanra:an (<kama-road) 男性或男人 male person; man
#n kamamanra:an (<kama-road) 男性或男人 male person; man
#e Now there was a man picking fruits.
#c 現在有一個男人摘水果。
#e (There) came a person pulling a goat.
#c 來了一個拉著山羊的人。
#e (He) passed by there under the tree.
#e (The man) touched the fruits and went away.
#c (那個男人)碰了一下水果然後走了。
#e (There) came a child riding a vehicle which you stomp like this.
#c 來了一個騎腳踏車的小孩, 就像這樣踩
#n 說這句時, informant 用手勢比腳, 所以應該加上noka 'a'ay, "with the feet"
#n Note: Informant gestures with feet, so requires noka 'a' ay
#e (The boy) looked around and upward (to the man).
#c (那個男孩)東張西望往上看(那個男人)。
#e The man picking fruits did not look downward.
#c 摘水果的人沒有往下看。
#e The child took away one basket and rode off.
#c 小孩偷了一籃, 載走了。
#e (The child rode his bike) through a stony road.
#c (小孩騎著它的腳踏車)經過一條石頭路。
#e (There) came a girl also riding a vehicle which you stomp like this.
#c 又來了一個女孩像這樣踩著腳踏車來。
#n 沒有跟對方說話或互相碰撞
#n 沒有跟對方說話或互相碰撞
#e (Both of them) met along the way; (one of them) touched the hat (causing it) to fall on the ground.
#c (他們兩個)在途中相遇, (其中一個)碰到帽子 (使得帽子)掉在地上。
#e The child turned his head around and saw.
#e The basket of fruit that (the boy) had stolen fell on the ground.
#c 那籃(被男孩)偷走的水果掉到地上。
#e Came four children who helped pick the fruits.
#c 來了四個小孩幫忙撿水果。
#e (They) put (the fruits) in the basket, lifted it, and put it on the bike.
#c 放到籃子裡, 提起來, 放到腳踏車。
#e (When the boy) had not gone long/far,
#e His hat was still on the ground.
#e There were three... (they) found the hat.
#e (One of the boys) took (the hat and) shook it clean.
#c (有一個男孩)拿起(帽子)拍一拍, 拍乾淨。
#e (One of the boys) walked toward (the boy) and gave the hat (back to him).
#c (一個男孩)走向 (那個小孩) 把帽子還給他。
#e (The children) walked away happily eating the fruit.
#c (那些小孩)吃著水果高興的走了。
#e (They) walked away passing by under the tree.
#e (The man) picking fruits (was) there under the tree.
#e What's happened? (Where are) the fruits I just picked?
#c 怎麼了? 我剛剛摘的水果(哪裡去了)?
#e He turned around and said, 'where is the stolen (basket) now?'
#c 他四下張望, 說, 被偷的那一籃現在在哪裡?
